name: Tiny Fairy in the forest
description:
This is a small game made for the Mini Jam 101, which was using the limitation: "Control the environment".

Controls:

A and D or Left and/or Right arrow keys + Mouse

I am extremely sorry for all glitches caused by physics, this is the first game i ever made with godot.

Music by https://errorball.itch.io/

Game by https://lordofcheese.itch.io/
